name: Seriously Simple Spam Blocker
author: Garth Mortensen

sections.description:
A plugin that interacts with the StopForumSpam.com api to protect your
website. Find out how many unwanted attempts have been blocked in Dashboard >
Tools > Seriously Simply Spam Blocker.

Usage

Simply upload/activate the plugin and you’re good to go.
sections.installation:
Installing “Seriously Simple Spam Blocker” can be done either by searching for “Seriously Simple Spam Blocker” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org.
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the “Plugins > Add New > Upload” screen in your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Customise the plugin from its settings page
sections.faq:
NONE! Because it’s that easy to use.

But seriously, when are more features coming?

Soon. More options are coming, such as which pages to block on, how strict you
want your filtering, etc.

1.0.4

  • 2013-01-06
  • Fixing bug that broke media uploader in WordPress 3.5

1.0.3

  • 2012-12-08

  • Fixing issue where spam blocker would not show in some browsers

  • Adding Modernizr check for drag and drop functionality

1.0.2

  • 2012-12-07
  • Adding option to hide spam blocker from specified submit buttons
  • Improving Javascript handling

1.0.1

  • 2012-12-07
  • Improving AJAX form handling
  • Removing spam blocker from widgets and WP search form

1.0.0

  • 2012-12-07
